about_the_game:
• 3 Exclusive Legends (Aepha, Doymera and Sudhia)¹
  • 216 Exclusive Legends Skins¹
  • Green Card in the killcam banner²
  • Diat Funa's gratitude³
  • Future Exclusive Weapons Skins⁴
  • Triple ALO Coins⁵


¹ Exclusive Legends and Skins are the same for each DLC. The Skins can only be equipped if the required kills have been achieved.

² The 5 cards are cumulative. If you buy more than one DLC, more cards of different colors will be shown automatically to your opponents when you make a kill.

³ Anarchy Legends Online is developed by a single person: Diat Funa. The purchase of one or more DLC contributes to the future development of free content for the game. ALO does not and never will contain play-to-win mechanics.

⁴ There is currently no release date for this feature, but it is among the highest priorities in the development of ALO. The Skins will be the same for each DLC and can only be equipped if the required kills have been achieved.

⁵ By owning one or more DLC, the Drop Rate is 12 ALO Coins (instead of 4) every 24 hours, dropped every 30 minutes of play (need not be contiguous) in your Steam Inventory. The rarity of ALO Coins remains random.
detailed_description:
• 3 Exclusive Legends (Aepha, Doymera and Sudhia)¹
  • 216 Exclusive Legends Skins¹
  • Green Card in the killcam banner²
  • Diat Funa's gratitude³
  • Future Exclusive Weapons Skins⁴
  • Triple ALO Coins⁵


¹ Exclusive Legends and Skins are the same for each DLC. The Skins can only be equipped if the required kills have been achieved.

² The 5 cards are cumulative. If you buy more than one DLC, more cards of different colors will be shown automatically to your opponents when you make a kill.

³ Anarchy Legends Online is developed by a single person: Diat Funa. The purchase of one or more DLC contributes to the future development of free content for the game. ALO does not and never will contain play-to-win mechanics.

⁴ There is currently no release date for this feature, but it is among the highest priorities in the development of ALO. The Skins will be the same for each DLC and can only be equipped if the required kills have been achieved.

⁵ By owning one or more DLC, the Drop Rate is 12 ALO Coins (instead of 4) every 24 hours, dropped every 30 minutes of play (need not be contiguous) in your Steam Inventory. The rarity of ALO Coins remains random.

name: Anarchy Legends Online - Green DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2550K (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600K (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Support Diat Funa (solo developer) and the future development of Anarchy Legends Online with this DLC! Unlock 3 exclusive Legends, hundreds of skins and the Green Card that will be shown to your opponents.
